alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 10:40AM AKST until January 22 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph over the highway summits will reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to midnight AKST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...2 to 3 inches of snowfall accumulation is expected. Significant blowing and drifting of snow is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
